general.title: General
general.messageNotBlank: This value should not be blank.

activation.helpText: Enable/disable CDN for current sales channel.For the 'All Sales Channels' tab - will be inherited by all sales channels in which the inheritance is enabled (by default).

cdnDomain.label: ImageEngine Delivery Address
cdnDomain.helpText: Enter ImageEngine address from your ImageEngine account. Example: aabbcc.cdn.imgeng.in

shopDomain.label: Shop-Domain
shopDomain.helpText: Enter the full name of your primary shop domain. This domain is required to generate your media URLS.

activation.title: Activation settings
activation.label: Activate CDN for the current sales channel.
